<<<<<<< HEAD
A treatise conteyning the true catholike and apostolike faith of the holy sacrifice and sacrament ordeyned by Christ at his last Supper vvith a declaration of the Berengarian heresie renewed in our age: and an answere to certain sermons made by M. Robert Bruce minister of Edinburgh concerning this matter. By VVilliam Reynolde priest. Rainolds, William, 1544?-1594.
[12], 447, [16] p.
Imprinted by Ioachim Trognesius, At Antvverpe : M.D.XCIII. [1593]
A reply to: Bruce, Robert. Sermons upon the sacrament of the Lords Supper. Includes index. With a final errata leaf; the last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
A treatise conteyning the true catholike and apostolike faith of the holy sacrifice and sacrament ordeyned by Christ at his last Supper vvith a declaration of the Berengarian heresie renewed in our age: and an answere to certain sermons made by M. Robert Bruce minister of Edinburgh concerning this matter. By VVilliam Reynolde priest. Rainolds, William, 1544?-1594.
[12], 447, [16] p.
Imprinted by Ioachim Trognesius, At Antvverpe : M.D.XCIII. [1593]
A reply to: Bruce, Robert. Sermons upon the sacrament of the Lords Supper. Includes index. With a final errata leaf; the last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
